text: Many fans are curious to know more about Steven Bartlett’s relationship with his girlfriend. Bartlett is a multimillionaire entrepreneur who is best known for hosting the popular podcast The Diary of a CEO. In 2024, the podcast made it to Spotify Wrapped’s Top 5 list of most popular podcasts in the world. He also appeared in the British reality show Dragons’ Den on BBC One. Here’s everything we know about Steven Bartlett’s girlfriend, her profession, and their relationship history. Who is Steven Bartlett’s girlfriend? Steven Bartlett is dating Melanie Vaz Lopes. The couple mostly keep their private lives away from the public eye. However, Bartlett has often mentioned his girlfriend in his popular podcast Diary of a CEO, where he gave his fans a sneak peek into their relationship. What is Melanie Vaz Lopes’ job? Melanie Vaz Lopes is an influencer and entrepreneur. Lopes is a native of Bordeaux, France, and is a successful fitness influencer with a special focus on breathwork and bodywork content. As a businesswoman, she has founded her own wellness brand named Bali Breathwork, which offers guidance on wellness and breathwork sessions. On the official website of the company, Lopes shares her journey to wellness and her three-year stay in Bali that inspired her to form the company. She writes that her “mission is to empower others to access their true potential and find their own unique path to healing and transformation.” Steven Bartlett and Melanie Vaz Lopes’ relationship history According to several reports, Steven Bartlett first met Melanie Vaz Lopes in 2016 via Instagram. However, just after a year of dating each other, the couple decided to call it quits. Giving the reason for the unfortunate breakup, Bartlett had revealed at the time that he was not ready for commitment amid his busy work schedule. He came to regret this decision six years later when he realized his love for Lopes. He flew to Bali to confess his feelings to her and the grand gesture ended with them getting back together in 2022. Following the reconciliation, the pair are still going strong and continue to enjoy a happy relationship. (via HELLO! Magazine)
